annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. After completing the necessary verifications, the Commission shall suspend the interim payments in the following situations:
annotations.translation: 3. 在完成必要的核查后，委员会应在以下情况下暂停临时付款：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) a Member State is not implementing the action as agreed in the co-financing decision; or
annotations.translation: (a) 某个成员国没有按照共同出资决定中的约定实施相关行动；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) all or part of an action justifies neither part nor the whole of the co-financing from the Fund.
annotations.translation: (b) 一项行动的全部或部分既没有理由从基金获得部分共同出资或全部共同出资。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In those cases, the Commission shall, stating its reasons, request that the Member State submit its comments and, where appropriate, carry out any corrections within a specified period of time.
annotations.translation: 对于上述情况，委员会应在说明理由后，要求该成员国提交意见，并在规定时限内酌情作出纠正。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. At the end of the period set by the Commission, the Commission may, if no agreement has been reached and the Member State has not made the corrections and taking account of any comments made by the Member State, decide within three months to:
annotations.translation: 4. 在委员会规定的期限结束时，如果未达成协议，且该成员国未作出纠正，委员会可考虑该成员国所提出的意见，在三个月内决定：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) reduce the interim payment referred to in Article 17(2); or
annotations.translation: (a) 减少第 17(2) 条所述的临时付款；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) make the financial corrections required by cancelling all or part of the contribution of the Fund to the action in question.
annotations.translation: (b) 通过取消基金对有关行动的全部或部分出资来进行必要的财务纠正。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the absence of a decision to do either (a) or (b) the interim payments shall immediately cease to be suspended.
annotations.translation: 如未决定进行 (a) 或 (b) 项，应立即停止支付临时付款。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 19
annotations.translation: 第 19 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Financial corrections
annotations.translation: 财务纠正

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The Member States shall, in the first instance, bear the responsibility for investigating irregularities, acting upon evidence of any major change affecting the nature or conditions for the implementation or supervision of an action and making the financial corrections required.
annotations.translation: 1. 该成员国应首先负责调查违规行为，在有证据表明实施或监督某项行动的性质或条件发生重大变化时采取行动，并作出必要的财务纠正。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Member State shall make the financial corrections required in connection with the individual or systemic irregularity . The corrections made by the Member State shall consist in cancelling all or part of the Community contribution. The Community funds released in this way may be re-used by the Member State for action in the same field as referred to in Article 4, in compliance with the arrangements to be defined in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 21(2).
annotations.translation: 该成员国应针对个别或系统性违规行为进行必要的财务纠正。该成员国作出的纠正应包括取消全部或部分共同体出资。以这种方式释放的共同体资金可以由该成员国根据第 21(2) 条中所述程序所定义的安排，重新用于第 4 条所述的相同领域的行动。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. If, after completing the necessary verifications, the Commission concludes that a Member State has not complied with its obligations under paragraph 1 of this Article, Article 18(3) and (4) shall apply.
annotations.translation: 2. 如果在完成必要的核查后，委员会得出结论认为某成员国没有履行本条第 1 段规定的义务，则应适用第 18(3) 和 (4) 条的规定。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Any sum received unduly and to be recovered shall be repaid to the Commission, together with interest on account of late payment.
annotations.translation: 3. 任何不当收取且应追回的款项应连同迟缴的利息一起退还给委员会。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 20
annotations.translation: 第 20 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Monitoring and evaluation
annotations.translation: 监测和评估

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. In each Member State the responsible authority shall take whatever measures are necessary to monitor and evaluate action.
annotations.translation: 1. 在每个成员国，主管机构应采取一切必要措施来监测和评估行动。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: To that end, the agreements and contracts it enters into with organisations charged with implementing the action shall contain clauses requiring them to present at least one report a year detailing progress made with regard to implementation of the action and achievement of the objectives attributed to it.
annotations.translation: 为此，它与负责实施该行动的组织签订的协议和合同应载有要求这些组织每年至少提交一份报告的条款，报告中应详细说明在实施该行动和实现相关目标方面取得的进展。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In addition, the responsible authority shall have an independent assessment made of the execution and of the effect of the actions implemented.
annotations.translation: 此外，主管机构应对所实施行动的执行情况和效果进行独立评估。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Each year the responsible authority shall draw up a summary report on implementation of the action in progress, which shall be attached to the request for co-financing referred to in Article 8.
annotations.translation: 2. 每年，主管机构应就正在开展的行动的实施情况起草一份总结报告，该报告应附在第 8 条提到的共同出资申请之后。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Within six months of the deadline fixed in the co-financing decision for the execution of expenditure, the responsible authority shall send the Commission a final report consisting of:
annotations.translation: 3. 在共同出资决定规定的支出执行期限后的六个月内，主管机构应向委员会提交一份最终报告，内容包括：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: CHAPTER V
annotations.translation: 第五章

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) financial accounts and a report on implementation of the action in accordance with the rules adopted by the Commission by the procedure referred to in Article 21(2);
annotations.translation: (a) 按照委员会根据第 21(2) 条所述程序通过的规则编制的财务账目和行动实施报告；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) the report on assessment referred to in paragraph 1.
annotations.translation: (b) 第 1 段所述的评估报告。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. The Commission shall submit a mid-term report to the European Parliament and the Council by 31 December 2002 at the latest and a final report by 1 September 2005 at the latest.
annotations.translation: 4. 委员会最迟应于 2002 年 12 月 31 日向欧洲议会和理事会提交中期报告，并最迟于 2005 年 9 月 1 日提交最终报告。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: THE COMMITTEE
annotations.translation: 专门委员会

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 21
annotations.translation: 第 21 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: The Committee
annotations.translation: 专门委员会

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The Commission shall be assisted by a committee.
annotations.translation: 1. 委员会应由一个专门委员会协助。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Where reference is made to this paragraph , Articles 3 and 7 of Decision 1999/468/EC shall apply.
annotations.translation: 2. 在提及本段时，应适用第 1999/468/EC 号决定第 3 和第 7 条。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. The Committee shall adopt its rules of procedure.
annotations.translation: 3. 专门委员会应通过其议事规则。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. The Committee may consider any question relating to this Decision, raised by the chairman or a representative of a Member State.
annotations.translation: 4. 专门委员会可审议成员国主席或代表提出的与本决定有关的任何问题。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: CHAPTER VI
annotations.translation: 第六章

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 22
annotations.translation: 第 22 条

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: SPECIAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING EMERGENCY MEASURES
annotations.translation: 关于紧急措施的特别规定

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Special provisions concerning emergency measures
annotations.translation: 关于应急措施的特别规定

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The provisions of paragraphs 2 to 5 of this Article shall apply to the implementation of the emergency measures provided for in Article 6.
annotations.translation: 1. 本条第 2 至第 5 段的规定适用于第 6 条规定的紧急措施的实施。
